title.rendered: Get the most from your facial

content.rendered:
Maximise your facial afterglow

1.  Sunscreen

Wear sunscreen to and from your facial appointment, to protect your skin from UVA and UVB rays.

2.  No Make-up

Remove all your make-up before you get to the spa, so your therapist can focus time on exfoliating, hydrating and nourishing your skin. And steer clear of make-up for a couple of days after your facial treatment if you can, and allow your skin to breathe.

3.  Exfoliate

Exfoliate between treatments with a gentle daily exfoliator. P.S. We love the Mukti 2-in-1 Resurfacing Exfoliant, it’s a cleanser, exfoliant and leave it on for 10 minutes and it’s a peel as well, amazing.

4.  Hydrate, Hydrate, Hydrate! 

Layer on a hydrating serum and moisturiser daily to keep skin glowy and radiant, and drink at least  2-3 litres of water a day.

5.  LED Skincare Therapy

Add-on a 20 minute *LightStim LED Therapy to your BODHI facial to boost collagen, minimise pores and improve skin tone. *Now available at Bodhi Cottesloe and Highgate.

6. Relax and enjoy!

 

Not sure which facial is right for you? Chat to one of our team who will be able to guide you on the best facial for your skin type, and also address any specific skincare concerns you have.
